hero.title: About EX Receivables
hero.subtitle: We are specialists in debt collection with many years of experience and high success rates.

mainContent.title: Professional debt collection
paragraphs: Our company specializes in out-of-court and court debt collection. We provide comprehensive legal services including legal assessment of each case and free consulting. We work discreetly, quickly and efficiently.

Our clients are individuals and legal entities who want their money back. We take into account the differences in receivables according to the business sectors of the specific client. We strive to provide comprehensive services tailored to your needs.
mainContent.fee: The contractual fee is 20% to 30% of the recovered amount.
mainContent.imageCaption: We are one of the few receivables specialists who work directly with bailiffs

items.title: Free consultation

items.title: Discreet approach

items.title: Multiple solutions
items.description: We always propose several solutions to your situation, and which solution you choose is entirely up to you

success.title: SUCCESS RATE
success.subtitle: We perform above average in debt collection!
paragraphs: We guarantee a professional approach and high success rate in debt collection.

Successful debt collection lies in the early delivery of quality documents about the receivable and sufficient information about the debtor. In such a case, you have up to a 90% chance of your receivables being paid by the debtor.

arbitration.title: Arbitration proceedings
arbitration.description: In our activities, we are prepared to collect receivables through arbitration proceedings before arbitrators, which takes place primarily on the basis of documents (e.g., a contractual document acknowledging the debt containing an arbitration clause).

advantages.title: Faster process
advantages.description: Much faster than proceedings before general courts

advantages.title: Lower costs
advantages.description: The fee is 3% of the value of the subject of the dispute, min. 3,000 CZK (plus VAT)

advantages.title: One-time expense
advantages.description: No additional costs are paid during the arbitration proceedings
